items.title: Currency Converter
items.description: A simple currency converter web app. I designed the app and developed the front end in React. I coded the back end API in NodeJS (TypeScript). The API gathers latest currency data every 3 days.

items.title: Calculator
items.description: A simple calculator web app which was built so I could learn React Hooks. I designed the app and developed the front end in React.

items.title: Lifetime Project
items.description: A small web application that shows you how much time you have left to live your life. It was very much inspired by Dhanish Gajjar's Lifeproject.

items.title: Simple Todos
items.description: A very simple web application that will add/remove todos using the browser's localStorage feature.

items.title: Weather App
items.description: A basic web application that will get your current location weather and allow you to add other weather locations.
